alert.note: Alert for Terrell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Terrell County through 515 AM CDT... At 430 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Terrell County Gas Plant, or 20 miles north of Dryden, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Terrell County Gas Plant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
